https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dn2Hg6uWE3Cytis6YGRH7gZ0MMf.jpg After one short date, a brilliant crossword constructor decides that a CNN cameraman is her true love. Because the cameraman's job takes him hither and yon, she crisscrosses the country, turning up at media events as she tries to convince him they are perfect for each other. All About Steve
